snippet: Specializing in hard cider, the Peconic Bay Winery, including a tasting room and 25 acres of planted vineyards, is on the market.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg Long Island vines column; Peconic Bay Winery in Cutchogue, including tasting room and 25 acres of planted vineyards, is for sale (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: Specializing in hard cider, the Peconic Bay Winery, including a tasting room and 25 acres of planted vineyards, is on the market.
